name: Clone of cavern no game (alpha)
description:
Clone of cavern no game is another clone of a game about caverns, mining and other. In this project I plan to add metallurgy, extensive crafting system, good water physics, destruction physics, NPCs, construction of vehicles and more.

There are blocks, that sizes can be of four types, but in version alpha 0.0.1 you can set only 16-voxel blocks.

In the next releases there maybe will be a version for Windows.

Me on patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jko
